file.name: category_openapi.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    ApiCmsV1Category:
      properties:
        create_time:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GoogleProtobufTimestamp'
        desc:
          description: 分类简介
          type: string
        icon:
          description: 分类图标
          type: string
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        name:
          description: 分类名称
          type: string
        pid:
          description: 父级分类id
          format: int64
          type: integer
        update_time:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GoogleProtobufTimestamp'
      type: object
    ApiCmsV1CreateCategoryReply:
      properties:
        data:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1Category'
      type: object
    ApiCmsV1DeleteCategoryReply:
      type: object
    ApiCmsV1DeleteCategoryRequest:
      properties:
        ids:
          items:
            format: int64
            type: integer
          type: array
      type: object
    ApiCmsV1GetCategoryRequest:
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      type: object
    ApiCmsV1ListCategoryReply:
      properties:
        list:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1Category'
          type: array
        page:
          description: 页码
          format: int32
          type: integer
        page_size:
          description: 分页大小
          format: int32
          type: integer
        total:
          description: 数据总计
          format: int64
          type: integer
      type: object
    ApiCmsV1ListCategoryRequest:
      properties:
        name:
          description: 名称搜索
          type: string
        page:
          description: 页码
          format: int32
          type: integer
        page_size:
          description: 分页大小
          format: int32
          type: integer
        pid:
          description: 父id查询
          format: int64
          type: integer
      type: object
    ApiCmsV1UpdateCategoryReply:
      properties:
        data:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1Category'
      type: object
    GoogleProtobufTimestamp:
      properties:
        nanos:
          description: Non-negative fractions of a second at nanosecond resolution.
            Negative second values with fractions must still have non-negative nanos
            values that count forward in time. Must be from 0 to 999,999,999 inclusive.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        seconds:
          description: Represents seconds of UTC time since Unix epoch 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z.
            Must be from 0001-01-01T00:00:00Z to 9999-12-31T23:59:59Z inclusive.
          format: int64
          type: integer
      type: object
info:
  description: api.cms.v1
  title: api.cms.v1
  version: "1"
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /api.cms.v1.CategoryService/CreateCategory:
    description: 创建文章类目
    post:
      description: 创建文章类目
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1Category'
        description: 文章类目结构体(请在此处定义数据结构)
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1CreateCategoryReply'
          description: ok
      summary: 创建文章类目
      tags:
      - api.cms.v1.CategoryService
    summary: CreateCategory
  /api.cms.v1.CategoryService/DeleteCategory:
    description: 批量删除文章类目
    post:
      description: 批量删除文章类目
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1DeleteCategoryRequest'
        description: 批量删除请求
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1DeleteCategoryReply'
          description: ok
      summary: 批量删除文章类目
      tags:
      - api.cms.v1.CategoryService
    summary: DeleteCategory
  /api.cms.v1.CategoryService/GetCategory:
    description: 获取文章类目详情
    post:
      description: 获取文章类目详情
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1GetCategoryRequest'
        description: 查询单个数据
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1Category'
          description: ok
      summary: 获取文章类目详情
      tags:
      - api.cms.v1.CategoryService
    summary: GetCategory
  /api.cms.v1.CategoryService/ListCategory:
    description: 查询文章类目列表
    post:
      description: 查询文章类目列表
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1ListCategoryRequest'
        description: 列表查询条件
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1ListCategoryReply'
          description: ok
      summary: 查询文章类目列表
      tags:
      - api.cms.v1.CategoryService
    summary: ListCategory
  /api.cms.v1.CategoryService/UpdateCategory:
    description: 更新文章类目
    post:
      description: 更新文章类目
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1Category'
        description: 文章类目结构体(请在此处定义数据结构)
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiCmsV1UpdateCategoryReply'
          description: ok
      summary: 更新文章类目
      tags:
      - api.cms.v1.CategoryService
    summary: UpdateCategory
tags:
- description: 文章类目服务
  name: api.cms.v1.CategoryService
